Package com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.users

Work with users, groups and roles.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurrentUser
    Class that defines the methods of current user.
    DevicePermission
    DevicePermission represents a device permission structure in the CoT which is used to be set for a user or a group.
    Group
    Class that defines the methods of group.
    GroupCollection
    Class that defines the methods of group collection.
    GroupReference
    A class that represents a reference to a group.
    GroupReferenceCollection
    The class that defines the methods on a collection of group references.
    Role
    Class that defines the methods of a role.
    RoleCollection
    Class that defines the methods of role collection.
    RoleReference
    A class that represents a reference to a role.
    RoleReferenceCollection
    The class that defines methods related to the role reference collections.
    User
    Class that defines the methods of user.
    UserApi
    Use the UserApi to work with users.
    UserCollection
    Class to retrieve and define sets of users (collection of users.)
    UserReference
    A class that represents a reference to a user.
    UserReferenceCollection
    The class that defines the operations on a collection of user references.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DevicePermission.Api
    enum for existing APIs
    DevicePermission.Permission
    Enum for allowed permissions

Package com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.users Description

Work with users, groups and roles.

The starting point here is the UserApi, which you can get from the CloudOfThingsPlatform.

More explanations about the concepts can be found at http://cumulocity.com/guides/reference/users/
